The museum has modern art, including works by * Paul CÃ©zanneKotodamaya, Morohashi Museum of Modern Art; retrieved 2012-6-26. * Salvador Dali * Henri Matisse * Pablo Picasso * Pierre-Auguste Renoir ==History== The museum was created in 1999 from the collection of Teizo Morohashi (1932-2003), who was the founder of Xebio Co.
